Project File¶

File extension: prj

File Object¶

class gsshapy.orm.ProjectFile(directory, filename, session)¶

ProjectFile is the file ORM object that interfaces with the project files directly.

__tablename__ = 'prj_project_files'¶
appendDirectory(directory)¶

Append directory to relative paths in project file. By default, the project files are written with relative paths.

read()¶

Front Facing Read from File Method
